alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued October 03 at 1:49PM PDT until October 03 at 4:15PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON FOR SAN BERNARDINO COUNTY... At 149 PM PDT, Scattered thunderstorms near Goffs road continue to develop this afternoon and areas of Flash Flooding remain likely. Radar estimates between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen in the past hour. Low water crossings and drainages crossing Goffs road as well as US-95 south of the Nevada Stateline may be impacted. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Highway 95 And I-40 and Essex. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
